vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μῠωπ-άζω,
blink the eyes, as shortsighted persons do: hence, to be shortsighted, metaphorically, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: primarily to close the eyes, contract the eyelids, wink; to be nearsighted, partially blinded, slow to understand, 2Pet. 1:9*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: sufrir de miopía, ser corto de vista
